column2: Commander, the target location is likely to be well-defended.

column2: We need to move up, get eyes on the location, and neutralize any enemy forces.

column2: Our operatives on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} recovered a functional piece of SLDF technology, but before they could deliver it to us, they were captured by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. We need a team to assault the location they're being held, recover the technology, and escape.
column3: Our operatives on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} recovered a functional piece of SLDF technology, but before they could deliver it to us, they were captured by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. We need a team to assault the location they're being held, recover the technology, and escape.

column2: Embassy Extraction
column3: Embassy Extraction

column2: All right, this should be a straightforward retrieval mission: get in, acquire the VIP, and get back out again.
column3: All right, this should be a straightforward retrieval mission: get in, acquire the VIP, and get back out again.

column2: The target you're recovering is a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} VIP. She's trapped in a building that's surrounded by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces - you'll need to engage them to get her out.
column3: The target you're recovering is a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} VIP. She's trapped in a building that's surrounded by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces - you'll need to engage them to get her out.

column2: Once you have the VIP in hand, get her to the designated landing zone for extraction.

column2: The VIP is secure, Commander - well done.

column2: Scratch one VIP. We're done here, Commander. The client isn't going to be happy.
column3: Scratch one VIP. We're done here, Commander. The client isn't going to be happy.

column2: You're in the designated area; hold position there and recover our VIP!
column3: You're in the designated area; hold position there and recover our VIP!

column2: The 'Mech carrying the VIP's assistant must survive
column3: The 'Mech carrying the VIP's assistant must survive

column2: One of our VIPs is in a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We need to get her offworld, but the building is surrounded by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. You will sweep aside the opposition, recover our VIP, and transport her to a designated landing zone for extraction. Be prepared for opposition - the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units surrounding the embassy won't let you extract our personnel without a fight. Payment will be issued when you deliver our VIP alive and in one piece.
column3: One of our VIPs is in a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We need to get her offworld, but the building is surrounded by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. You will sweep aside the opposition, recover our VIP, and transport her to a designated landing zone for extraction. Be prepared for opposition - the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units surrounding the embassy won't let you extract our personnel without a fight. Payment will be issued when you deliver our VIP alive and in one piece.

column2: One Man's Art
column3: One Man's Art

column2: This is a straightforward retrieval. Locate the painter and get to the Evac Zone.
column3: This is a straightforward retrieval. Locate the painter and get to the Evac Zone.

column2: First step. Find our target in the location where we suspect he's being held...
column3: First step. Find our target in the location where we suspect he's being held...

column2: ... and extract safely. Keep the 'Mech carrying the artist in one piece!
column3: ... and extract safely. Keep the 'Mech carrying the artist in one piece!

column2: Best of luck, Commander.
column3: Best of luck, Commander.

column2: Excellent work, commander. Our employer's favorite painter is on his way to safety.
column3: Excellent work, commander. Our employer's favorite painter is on his way to safety.

column2: The religious zealots have gotten their pound of flesh today, one way or another.
column3: The religious zealots have gotten their pound of flesh today, one way or another.

column2: You're in the area where the artist is being held. Hold position and give him a chance to board one of the Mechs.
column3: You're in the area where the artist is being held. Hold position and give him a chance to board one of the Mechs.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
column3: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.

column2: That's it, the 'Mech carrying the painter's masterpiece is scrapped. We have failed that objective. Focus on getting the artist to safety.
column3: That's it, the 'Mech carrying the painter's masterpiece is scrapped. We have failed that objective. Focus on getting the artist to safety.

column2: Commander, I don't pretend to understand what's so offensive about this painting, but they take that sort of thing seriously out here. As for retrieving the painting, apparently it's worth even more after all this controversy.
column3: Commander, I don't pretend to understand what's so offensive about this painting, but they take that sort of thing seriously out here. As for retrieving the painting, apparently it's worth even more after all this controversy.

column2: Ensure the Mech Carrying the Masterpiece Survives

column2: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} philanthropist is a patron of the arts here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. A favored painter has been accused of heresy by the system's religious police. These zealots are propped up by foreign {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} agents. He'll be extradited to face trial and likely execution in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} territory. We can't allow that to happen, but we don't want to incur reprisal from the religious leaders. That's where you come in. Locate the painter, rescue him and, at the personal request of the patron, recover the painting that started this whole mess.
column3: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} philanthropist is a patron of the arts here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. A favored painter has been accused of heresy by the system's religious police. These zealots are propped up by foreign {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} agents. He'll be extradited to face trial and likely execution in {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} territory. We can't allow that to happen, but we don't want to incur reprisal from the religious leaders. That's where you come in. Locate the painter, rescue him and, at the personal request of the patron, recover the painting that started this whole mess.

column2: We've located the secure facility where {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} stores its payroll before distributing it to local forces. We believe we could put that payroll to better use. We'd like to hire you to hit the facility and steal the payroll. It will be well-defended, and there is a bonus if you eliminate all the defenders.
column3: We've located the secure facility where {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} stores its payroll before distributing it to local forces. We believe we could put that payroll to better use. We'd like to hire you to hit the facility and steal the payroll. It will be well-defended, and there is a bonus if you eliminate all the defenders.
